Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Precision Business Park amenities include convenient access to retail, restaurants, hotels, and miles of walking/ bicycle trails.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Office flex space available in this 31,110 square foot building, a part of a four
building campus with immediate access to I-25. Flexible floor plan with open
areas, separate training rooms and offices.

This unit is a great flex space in a desirable area northeast of the Mulberry and Lemay intersection in the Fort Collins Industrial Business AirPark. The property benefits from easy access to Highway 14 (Mulberry Street) I-25, Old Town Fort Collins and the Brewery District.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
This property is located in Loveland, Colorado, a dynamic and growing city located 45 miles north of Denver and 12 miles south of Fort Collins.
The premier location has access through Loveland via the primary thoroughfare, Highway 287, with direct access to Coloradoâ€™s north-south
freeway, I-25, via Highway 34.
With its high quality of life, this is an ideal location for a corporate headquarters, regional business operation, design showroom, residential construction-focused showroom, or warehouse.
This location also affords access to major air, motor, and rail arteries as well as 3 acres of parking or outside storage space.
